english.segment1: Give me attention. I need it now. Too much distance. To measure it out, out loud. Tracing patterns across a personal map. And making pictures where the lines overlap. Where the lines overlap
english.segment2: No one is as lucky as us. We're not at the end. But oh, we already won, no no. No one is as lucky as us. Is as lucky as us
english.segment3: Call me over. Tell me how you got so far. And never making a single sound. I'm not used to it. But I can learn. There's nothing to it. I've never been happier. Never been happier
english.segment4: No one is as lucky as us. We're not at the end. But oh, we already won, oh no. No one is as lucky as us. Is as lucky as us
english.segment5: Now I've got a feeling if I sang this loud enough. You would sing it back to me. I've got a feeling if I sang this loud enough. You would sing it back to me
english.segment6: I've got a feeling (I've got a feeling). That you would sing it back to me. You would sing it back to me
english.segment7: No one is as lucky as us. We're not at the end. But oh, we already won, oh no. No one (no one) is as lucky as us. Is as lucky as us. Is as lucky as us
